preqs: Students must have passed one of the following units: ACC2100, AFC2120, ACC2120.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {AAF2160, AAF3160, AAF3164, ACC3160, AF216, AF2163, AF216SP, AF216U, AFC3160%, AFC3164}
Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACC2100, ACC2120, AFC2120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACB3041, ACC3160, ACF3600, ACF3631, ACG3041, ACW3041, AFC3160, AFF3631, AFG3041, AFW3041}

description: This unit encompasses the nature and purpose of audit and assurance services, and the regulatory and professional environment in which they operate. Students apply professional, ethical and legal requirements stemming from the assurance framework and applicable auditing pronouncements to 'real world' scenarios.
